title: Drawing, 1917-4-24, August 1851
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on light brown paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite ? with figures: H; at top center:  S - E; at top right: H Herbage / 2 yellowish earth / 3 light grey boulders / 4 crome yellow stains; and at bottom center:  [caption and date].
description: Horizontal view of a rocky coast is shown in the foreground and in the left middle distance, where its higher part is wooded;a sailing boat is shown in the right middle distance.
